entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Ice pellets or snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning early in the evening then changing to ice pellets near midnight. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
